name: Realm Jumper
description:
this game was created within 4 days for the Riverside Game Jam based on the themes of upside down or inside out this game was built upon my interpretation of those themes with the help of my team/classmates Nathan, Adam and Lucy

controls:
the character can move left and right using the A and D keys and space bar to jump, pressing space in mid-air will  activate a double jump
left mouse button to shoot (I didn't add anything to shoot in time)
